subject: Presidential Medal of Freedom
Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. great Bill Russell, who will receive the Presidential Medal of Freedom on Tuesday, said the award is “a close second” to the greatest personal honor in his life.
snippet: The N.B.A. great Bill Russell, who will receive the Presidential Medal of Freedom on Tuesday, said the award is “a close second” to the greatest personal honor in his life.
